result.execSummary:
The defendant Melissa Ann Stern was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Melissa Ann Stern is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Melissa Ann Stern was found guilty of Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Melissa Ann Stern was found guilty of Possess Amphetamine/LSD/Psilocin, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(d).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Dept of Corrections may file a petition requesting early discharge.

miscConds.notes: Cts 1 & 3:  Total court costs due on payment plan of $50/mo commencing 10/23/15 payable to the Clerk of Court's Office.  Failure to make payments when due will result in one day jail for each $25 outstanding.

AODA assessment and any follow-up counseling/treatment deemed appropriate.
Random testing.
No controlled subst/prescrip medic unless prescribed.
Defendant to advise the agent of any prescribed medications.
Submit to DNA sample at the Ozaukee County Jail by 10/30/15.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Melissa Ann Stern

Jury trial on June 9, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Melissa Ann Stern in court.  Shannon M. Whitworth appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense is requesting a trial date. Defendant has declined pretrial offer. Court advises it will not entertain any further negotiations.  Jury trial scheduled for June 9, 2016 at 08:30 am.
